input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector (iPad Mini 4 2015 Version)

Item keywords:
Tempered Glass Screen Protector Fits Perfectly for the New Apple iPad Mini 4
Smooth and Touch Sensitive Glass Surface. No Air Bubble Application
Anti Shatter Glass, Ultra Thin and Tough, Real Premium Tempered Glass with anti chip 9H Hardness
Protects your iPad Mini 4 and Prevents LCD Scratches
HD Clear and Anti-fingerprint Anti Smudge oleophobic coating
Feels like the glass you are used to on your phone
Slim design doesn't add unnecessary bulk

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Introducing the Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector - the ultimate defense for your iPad Mini 4's delicate screen. This real premium tempered glass with an anti-chip 9H hardness rating is ultra-thin and tough, providing the ultimate protection for your device. The HD clear and anti-fingerprint anti-smudge oleophobic coating ensures a smooth and touch-sensitive glass surface, while the slim design doesn't add unnecessary bulk to your device.

The tempered glass screen protector fits perfectly for the New Apple iPad Mini 4, providing a perfect fit and no air bubbles during application. The anti-shatter glass is designed to break under extreme pressure, protecting your iPad Mini 4 from shock and impact.

This product is backed by a 100% satisfaction guarantee, ensuring that you are completely satisfied with your purchase. Don't settle for less when it comes to protecting your investment. Upgrade to the Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector today!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
